Join Our Discord!
Joining our Discord server is a requirement for playing on KRDLabs cluster.
Having Issues?
If you are having any issues, please click the discord link in the previous section. There, you can submit server suggestions or put in a helpdesk ticket for support.
Coming Soon!
Coming Soon!
Coming Soon!
KRDLabs PVE Cluster FAQs!!!
Here are some frequently asked questions. If you dont see your answer here, please reach out to us via Discord.
Q: What mods are installed on the server?
A: We have carefully selected mods to enhance your gaming experience. You can find a list of installed mods by clicking the "INSTALLED MODS" on the left side menu.
Q: How often is the server wiped?

A: We aim to provide a stable and enjoyable gaming environment, so server wipes are infrequent. However, wipes may occur during major game updates or if necessary for maintenance purposes. We will notify players in advance if a wipe is scheduled.
Q: Are there any rules I need to follow?

A: Yes, we have a set of rules in place to ensure fair play and a positive community experience. These rules typically cover areas such as harassment, cheating, and griefing. You can find our server rules posted in the above "Rules" tab or in our Discord server.
Q: How do I report a player for breaking the rules?

A: If you encounter a player violating server rules, please report them to one of our moderators or admins. You can do this through the in-game chat, Discord server, or by using the "SURVIVORS HUB" on the left side menu. Be sure to provide as much detail as possible, including the player's name and a description of the incident.
Q: Can I bring my friends to the server?

A: Absolutely! We encourage you to invite your friends to join our server and embark on adventures together. Just make sure they also adhere to our server rules to maintain a friendly gaming environment.
Q: Is there a Discord server for the community?
A: Yes, we have a Discord server where players can chat, share tips, and participate in events. You can find the link to our Discord server in the game's chat or on our server information page.
Q: Can I suggest changes or improvements for the server?

A: Absolutely! We value feedback from our community and are always open to suggestions for improving the server experience. Whether it's a mod recommendation, gameplay adjustment, or general feedback, we encourage players to share their ideas with us through our Discord server or other communication channels.
Q: How do I contact the server admins?
A: If you need assistance or have any concerns, you can reach out to our server admins via Discord. They are here to help resolve any issues and ensure everyone has an enjoyable gaming experience.
We hope this FAQ helps address any questions you may have about our Ark game server. If you have any further inquiries, don't hesitate to ask our friendly community or server staff. Happy gaming!
KRDLabs PVE Cluster Rules!!!
Survivors who break server rules risk consequences. Small infractions may get a warning, but repeated or serious offenses can lead to being banished from the ARK temporarily or permanently.
1. Please pick up ALL taming traps after use. Doing so helps eliminate lag and keep our cluster clean for all to enjoy.
2. Please collect all eggs, both high and low levels. Do not throw them. By doing so you ruin the spawns and cause lag for our cluster. Eat your unwanted eggs.
3. Names labeled Human, Humanoid, etc are not permitted on the cluster. You will be asked to choose a new name or we will pick for you.

4. Your base must be within render of its own outer walls at all times. This includes the base and all surrounding walls, gates, fencings or other structures included in your base. If we find your base does not follow these rules, you will be asked to downsize.

5. Bases cannot block player spawn points. You will be asked to move. Failure to heed this rule may result in removal of your base by admin. Absolutely no building in the immediate vicinity of terminals, obelisks, or mission dispatchers. Items here will be removed on sight. Emergency outposts are permitted as long as they are for temporary use only!

6. Absolutely no structure spamming. (Example: pillaring or foundation spam) you will be given 24hrs to remove it. Only one cloning chamber and Tek rep allowed per tribe. All replicators, cloning chambers, and crafting tables should be turned off when not in use to limit the strain on the cluster.

7. Do not leave tames wandering or mating while unattended. You will only receive one warning, then they will be killed. This includes leaving unwanted tames to wander on aggressive. Please dispose of your unwanted tames by killing them off.
8. No racist, or homophobic slurs allowed in gamertags, ark names, or chat.
9. Survivors caught using exploits, hacks, dupes, or any unfair advantage will face consequences up to permanent exile from the ARK.
